name: secondbrain-monorepo
description: Second Brain OS - Monorepo for Chrome extension, backend, and shared packages

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:extension
scripts.build: npm run build -w @secondbrain/contracts && npm run build -w @secondbrain/sdk && npm run build -w @secondbrain/backend && npm run build -w @secondbrain/extension
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @secondbrain/contracts && npm run typecheck -w @secondbrain/sdk && npm run typecheck -w @secondbrain/backend && npm run typecheck -w @secondbrain/extension

author: Robert Cousins
